name: Lara's Boutique
description:
Lara is the owner of a boutique that wants to become the most influent dressmaker of the world. She needs to satisfy her strict customers to make it possible, but all alone it seems very difficult. Why don't you go to help her?

FEATURES:

  • Isometric Camera
  • Cartoon style
  • 4 short minigames that encourage the replay
  • Up to 3 levels of difficulty with different clothes
  • Original Soundtrack

DEVELOPED BY:

LAZY SLOTH STUDIOS (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2019/2020)

Programming
Alessandro Davini

Game Design
Federico Mele
Ruggero Simonetta

3D Art
